form.title: Lingerie Sizes Calculator
form.incode: Please enter the number on the right
form.tips: If your figure is beyond the input range, please contact the sales person for assistance.

measure.title: Measurement methods
measure.topDescribe: The measurement is the fullest part of the breast
measure.topExplain: Kindly take note that just measure it gently without bending or crushing the nipples.
measure.bottomDescribe: The measurement is at the bottom of breast
measure.waistDescribe: The measurement is at the thinnest part of your waist
measure.buttocksDescribe: The measurement is at the widest part of the hips
measure.legDescribe: The measurement is at the thickest part of a single thigh
measure.tips: Please stand up straight with your feet together. Do not hunch back when measuring, and keep the measurement tape level from tilting up or down.

recommend.title2: Your recommended size is as follows

tips.tErr: Exceed size of upper bust measurement (75~127.5cm)
tips.bErr: Exceed size of lower bust measurement (65~100cm)
tips.tp: The upper bust size should not be smaller than the lower bust size.
